release.new: Logarithmic functions added to the custom shape creator!
'Randomize' feature added to the options menu!
Many bug fixes and improved crash reporting system!

release.info: Improved user interface - smaller, new adjust buttons, and more!
Added tutorial! Accessible by going to (Settings) -> (Tutorial)
GOLD: Make copies of palettes and shapes! (Long click an item and press the copy button)
GOLD: Added inverse trigonometry functions to the custom shape creator!
Added (Settings) -> (Unrestricted Parameters)
Added 2 new palettes: Eye, Who
Bookmark your fractals! -- Access bookmarks through (Image) -> (Bookmarks)
Added 28 default bookmarks
Param 1 of the Kleinian shape can now create spirals
Added 2 new textures: Image 1 and Image 2
Added 1 new shape: Angelbrot
Added Seed parameter to most shapes
Added (Color) -> (Accent)
Zooming past 1e-6 on shapes like Sine 1 is now disabled by default... Go to (Settings) -> (Allow Slow Renders) to enable
Added 5 new textures: Converge Time (Smooth), Disc Lens, Star Lens, Sine Lens, Field Lines
Added 2 new color palettes: Fusion, Refraction
Fixed custom shape calculator bug
Added (Image) -> (Ratio) for saving images of different sizes
Double-tap in (Position) mode to increase zoom
Added (Settings) -> (Use Alternate Split Method) to fix zooming on certain devices
Moved settings menu
Fixed dual-precision bug on certain devices
Fixed display bug when changing position
Fixed memory usage crash when showing GOLD upgrade screen
Fixed crash when creating palettes with more than 8 colors
Fixed bugs with multiple textures on certain devices
Added Gold upgrade!
Added several new shapes, textures, color palettes, and parameters
GOLD: Added custom shape and custom color palette creation
GOLD: Added higher resolution options up to 4K
Added ability to choose favorites in item lists
Added RATE option to all parameters for more controlled adjustments
Resolution automatically chosen during parameter changes
Improved memory usage
All shapes now support deep zoom (up to 1e-12) with textures
Escape Time (Smooth) texture now compatible with all divergent shapes
Stripe Average and Curvature Average textures improved (no discontinuities)
Color palettes Time, Starling, Overgrown, and Pagoda added
Increase SETTINGS -> RENDER -> CHUNKS if the app crashes for high values of SHAPE -> ITERATE
Fixed TEXTURE -> MODE -> IN/BOTH settings
Fixed COLOR -> AUTO errors
Fixed another bug that caused crash on startup
Added support for devices with OpenGL ES 3.0/3.1
Fixed several bugs that caused crash on startup
Color palettes Chroma, Island, Rose, Kingfisher, Bioluminescent, Atlas, Fossil, Alpha, Peach, Jazz, and Polygon added
Interrupt image render process by changing position/resolution
Toggle COLOR -> AUTO to automatically fit colors based on position
Deeper zoom (without textures, up to 1e-12) available on transcendental shapes i.e. Mandelbrot (Power), Clover, Sine 1, Sine 2, Horseshoe Crab, and Kleinian
More resolution options
Larger menu height when changing texture/shape/palette
Enabling SETTINGS -> CONTINUOUS RENDER disables SETTINGS -> RENDER BACKGROUND
Hints added for SHAPE -> ITERATE
